description: Gets details about a table bucket policy. For more information, see Viewing a table bucket policy in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:GetTableBucketPolicy permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

nested_items.name: resourcePolicy
nested_items.description: The JSON that defines the policy.
